translation: O mighty-armed Arjuna, this is the inferior Prakriti; know it as distinct from My higher Prakriti, the very life-element, by which this world is upheld.
commentary: 7.5 Apra lower? Iam this? from here from this? You but? Another different? Prakritim nature? Viddhi know? May My? Param higher? Jivabhutam the very lifeelement? Mighty-armed O mightyarmed? Yaya by which? This is this? is held is upheld? Jagat world.Commentary The eightfold Nature described in the previous verse is the inferior Nature. It constitutes the Kshetra or the field or matter. It is impure. It generates evil
